verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:5
verses.text: And thou shalt speak and say before the Lord thy God, A Syrian ready to perish was my father, and he went down into Egypt, and sojourned there with a few, and became there a nation, great, mighty, and populous:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:6
verses.text: And the Egyptians evil entreated us, and afflicted us, and laid upon us hard bondage:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 26:7
verses.text: And when we cried unto the Lord God of our fathers, the Lord heard our voice, and looked on our affliction, and our labour, and our oppression:
